title: Picken (Andrew)
body: E.:Madeira illustrated, with a description of the Island; London 1842. This work contains 9 magnificent engravings, representing various points of the island, and is preceded by a description made by James Macaulay, based on clarifications provided by Cirilo W. Page and Jos√© Phelps.

1842: Publication of Madeira illustrated, with a description of the Island
